title: 'Ya Ghani, Ya Mughni, Ya Fattah, Ya Razzaq Ã—33 increases provision? Surah Waqiya for poverty? Assim
transcript: from singapore she says someone told us that to say 33 times would increase in your provision so is this authentic the answer is no this is not authentic and it's baseless and likewise it's basis with a lot of the people in the subcontinent think that reciting surat al-wakir every day would prevent you from falling into poverty this is totally not true at all
